titleStmt.title: Pietas in patriam the life of His Excellency Sir William Phips, Knt. late Captain General and Governour in Chief of the province of the Massachuset-Bay, New England, containing the memorable changes undergone, and actions performed by him / written by one intimately acquainted with him.
titleStmt.author: Mather, Cotton, 1663-1728.

titleStmt.title: Pietas in patriam the life of His Excellency Sir William Phips, Knt. late Captain General and Governour in Chief of the province of the Massachuset-Bay, New England, containing the memorable changes undergone, and actions performed by him / written by one intimately acquainted with him.
titleStmt.author: Mather, Cotton, 1663-1728.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Sam. Bridge ... for Nath. Hiller,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Mather by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Item at reel 1641:5 identified as Wing P2135 (number cancelled).
Reproduction of original in Library of Congress and the British Library.
Reprinted in 1699, and also included in Mather's "Magnalia Christi americana ..." London, 1702, and later editions.
